title: [feature request] Specify time interval when using the 'top' filter
body:
When choosing the 'top' filter in a subreddit, it isn't possible to specify the time interval from which to filter posts as on the website. In the app it is always set to the last 24 hours, while on the website options like since ever, since last year or last month are available.
Does the Reddit API allow this, and could this be implemented?

title: Don't show duplicate things when appending data
label: [Label(name="P2")]
body: I think there is some SQL query that can be done to only show unique things, so that endless scrolling doesn't show the same thing twice.

title: Can't be updated in F-Droid due to proprietary binaries & a bug report
label: [Label(name="P0")]
body:
Hello, 

I have been using rbb for a while now through the F-droid.org repository, and I realized there is a bug: My upvotes for posts are not registered on the main site. For some reason I can't see them when I login to the reddit webpage on my laptop. 

I was going to open an issue about that, but then I checked and found out that Fdroid still uses version 2.3, and now 3.0 is available. So I asked for an update to this and the answer was that it can't be done, cause there's a proprietary binary in the source: https://github.com/btmura/rbb/tree/master/libs.

Are you aware of these issues? Any chance for this to be fixed?

title: Ability to view comments without first opening link
body: Would be nice to be able to jump directly to the comments page without opening the link first.  Perhaps add an option in the long press of a topic to do so.  Or maybe having a clickable area somewhere in the submission listing area.

title: Review unnecessary refreshing due using single URI for most things
Pending outgoing messages should appear in sent
No distinction between read and unread messages
Message subject has re: when sharing from external app
Messages and comments don't have details on large displays
Deleting the header comment causes it to disappear and then crash after
Comment header text isn't properly styled
Message things don't show subject or source
Duplicate message appears in listing after sending a message
Menus need to be consolidated to avoid 3+ items about subreddits
Titles in new post/message wizard aren't truncated
More menu item fixes
body:
- add view profile when viewing thing
- profile activity doesn't remember last page in single pane mode

title: Combine new post and message into a single menu item with tabs
Keyboard covers up captcha in landscape mode...
Use column constraints and replace delete+insert with just replace for tables
Provider never returns error and dumps all entries to screen
Use same account spinner in large version for profiles and messages
Rbb doesn't appear in share menus of other apps.
Pending saved items don't appear in the list and removed ones still appear.
Save menu item doesn't change when you save things
Rename "View sidebar" to "About subreddit" or "Subreddit info"
Viewing someone's profile should always goto overview
/u/rbbtest1 links should be clickable
Move select constants to the locations where they are used rather in the table class
Consider not showing reply and compose message options from the thing list when viewing a subreddit
Be consistent in naming db tables
body: Tables that represent pending actions should be suffixed with "Actions" and have an action column.

title: Consider a confirmation dialog when deleting things
Include version in user agent string
Can't bookmark items for future reference
Tapping on colored voting arrows should undo vote
rbb doesn't offer to handle links to reddit
Fix up button behavior
all subreddit disappears after second sync
random subreddit doesn't work
Review OutsideOverlay style for scrollbars
Add support for multis
Links in comment header can't be clicked
Copy URL for message replies is empty
Can't reply to a message
Merge comment reply and submit link dialogs into ComposeFormFragment
Use new SessionProvider methods for handling sessions in ThingProvider
Refactor JsonParser class to not have a long list of if statements for every possible key
Merge CommentListFragment with ThingListFragment
body: ThingListFragment is a mess right now, but it's best if we merge these two to avoid doing extra work to support new features.

title: Rewrite Formatters class to allow a StringBuilder to be provided
body: Could probably eliminate some unnecessary object creation.

title: Rewrite Urls class to be thread safe
body: Also provide option to return Strings in cases where a URI object is not necessary.

title: rbb doesn't switch to newly added account when adding to the middle alphabetically
Can't right click on things and send message to author
Move "Debug" to main menu for debug builds and rename "Settings" menu item to "Accounts"
Use rounded corner recipe in thumbnail loader
body:
Thanks @pineapplefrog

http://www.curious-creature.org/2012/12/11/android-recipe-1-image-with-rounded-corners/

title: Comments aren't showing points

title: Sometimes comment lists have duplicated items for all comments
Sometimes added subreddits disappear
body: Probably a bug in the sync adapter.

title: Collapsing a comment with voting arrows hides the arrows and shifts the author appearing to be janky
Updated score in comments after voting should be reflected in thing list
body: If you navigate to the comments of something, the vote count is often different, so when you vote on something, it looks strange to have a different count when you move back.

title: "add front page" checkbox in "add subreddits" dialog is confusing
body:
Expected the "add fr ont page" checkbox to depend on what I entered as a subreddit.  This lead me to believe the subreddit I was inputting was being added under "front page".

Don't think it should be a checkbox.  Maybe a separate action.  Why even special case front page - why not let the user add "frontpage" manually.

title: Consider providing a link to create a new account in add account dialog
Add tab with search results within subreddit
Avoid spurious collapsing of comments
body: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener.html

title: Add parent option for comments so you can see what the reply is for
Action bar and mail menu item should have a count of unread messages like Gmail.
Share action menu item flickers causing jank
body: Also avoid updating the item on every prepare if it's not going to change.

title: Comment points go back to zero after downvoting negative post
No subreddit results shows wrong empty message
View profile option appears no matter how many items selected
No view sidebar when browsing in subreddit search
Copy URL context option doesn't work in posts search
Messages aren't marked read after reading them
No way to compose a message
Add notifications and what not when new unread mail is received
Make mail sync time configurable
Profile comments and messages don't show link url when loaded
Clicking on a message goes to some random thing
Score not updated in thing list after voting on comments page
Remove existing data when creating a new account
GlobalMenuFragment NPE exception for searchItem

title: Votes sometimes disappear due to sync adapter.
body: The sync adapter deletes the votes after it has processed them which causes the votes to disappear. Might consider updating other tables before deleting the votes.

title: Link title is not properly formatted sometimes
Link title stretches too far across screen
Basic mail box implementation
Number of comments appears on comment item
Copy URL for context comments has null in it
Points don't appear properly for comments in profile
Comments in profile don't indicate what post they are from
Subreddit cab add option doesn't let you choose what account to add subreddit to
Consider a menu option to view the subreddit of a post
body: Sometimes you want to view the subreddit of a post in a user's profile.

title: View profile from menu always shows the same profile
No way to switch between profile overview, comments, or submitted
User profiles seem to paginate same content over and over
Clicking on items in user profile doesn't do anything
Integrate YouTube video player API
body: It was presented at Google IO, but I don't know if it's been released. Make sure not to forget about this.

title: Initial user profile implementation
Check that content providers show a toast on errors
Don't trigger sync when adding subreddits to app storage account
Comment count doesn't change when inserting or deleting
Subreddit fields should trim r/ prefix if provided
Fix comments cab disappearing on config changes
body: The loaders aren't finished loading when the context action bars are restored. Check the adapter state and then invalidate the pending action mode in onLoadFinished.

title: Subreddit search shouldn't immediately select the first subreddit
body: Sometimes you end up getting pictures of...

title: Account spinner adjusts size when it loads causing jank
Loading thumbnails makes flinging stutter
body: Use isCancelled in AsyncTask

title: Header comment is clickable even if there is nothing to do
Standardize language for edit text hints
Replace app name in account spinners to maybe "app storage"
NPE in SubredditSyncAdapter#initializeAccount on configuration change

title: Comment reply dialog missing respond inline option
Current url not restored when changing orientation in LinkFragment
Comment reply dialog should use DialogWhenLarge theme
Autodetect whether body is a link when submitting a link
Use DialogWhenLarge theme for SubmitLinkActivity
Single tap for expand/collapse and long press for context menu
Add subreddit account switcher doesn't work
Remove field labels in Add Subreddit dialog
Submit a link dialog's title and text should be saved as a draft if cancelled
Can't submit a link via the submit a link dialog
body: Right now there is only a text option.

title: Subreddit in submit a link should auto complete to user's subreddits
Captcha pops up without any sign of loading
Submit a link dialog doesn't populate subreddit field
Use locale formatting for numbers like points, comments, and subscriber counts
Implement basic submit a link functionality
Timestamps on comments are sometimes negative
Timestamps on things and comments don't have "ago" at the end...
Italicize status when comment is collapsed
Clicking on voting arrows for pending comments causes background exception
Need assets for all the action context menu items
Reuse a SpannableStringBuilder in ThingView to save allocations
Comments should always have points in the status
SubmitLinkActivity should be a fragment to avoid wasting resources
Deleting multiple subreddits has incorrect toast
body: It looks like a format string issue.

title: Submit a link is always present even without accounts
Comment voting arrows shouldn't display a score between them
body: The score should be in the status line for comments.

title: Status for things should have points if there are no voting arrows
Menu items should be ordered from specific to general
body: Settings should be at the bottom not the top.

title: Make periodic subreddit interval configurable
Add periodic sync for subreddits
Add copy URL to comment context menu
Deleted items should not have voting arrows
Increase touch targets for links in comments
Review subreddit finder api
body: http://www.reddit.com/api/subreddits_by_topic.json?query=karma

title: Support —
Subreddit previews shouldn't list your subreddits on the side
Rbb should restore last selected subreddit
Remove newlines in thread titles
Comment reply dialog should show a dropdown to switch accounts
Check that all AsyncTask#execute calls specify executor
Long pressing and selecting comments doesn't highlight the item
After adding account the account/filter dropdown shows account styled as a category
Selected subreddit isn't highlighted properly in JB
rbb doesn't switch to new account after adding it in Settings
Don't show voting arrows when a user isn't logged in
some posts that link to a pic don't seem to open in rbb.
label: [Label(name="P1")]
body: When I select "open in another app" and choose chrome it works. Swiping to comments section works though. Screenshots attached. The reddit post is http://www.reddit.com/r/diablo3/comments/xai3w/demon_hunter_from_diablo_3_by_envisageu/  The file is http://gameasky.com/upfile/2012/J.jpg .

title: Clicking links in LinkFragment should open up in browser
Create resource pool to recycle entities like Message does
onLoadFinished called twice when changing orientations
NSFW tags for subreddits in search results
ShareProvider sometimes shows Bluetooth icon
body: Maybe the share provider is being shown before it has an intent properly set?

title: Allow things to be pinned for offline viewing
body: It would be nice to do this for webpages too, but I don't know how to do it yet.

title: Subscriber count when viewing sidebar
Collapsible comments for Mike
body: He won't stop asking about it, so we better get it done.

title: Wrong links when URL ends with periods or parens
body:
http://foo/bar.

(http://foo/bar)

title: 2 Pane Tablet Layout
body: It would behave like Gmail. This is probably necessary for smaller screens that aren't phones.

title: Multiple Login Support
body: ...so you can comment and stuff.

title: Light and dark theme switcher
body:
Add the ability to switch between light and dark themes. 

This will probably be tucked away in settings.

title: Font size changer
body: Not everybody is blind like me. I think a single slider in settings should suffice.

title: Support for underscores in subreddit names
body: There are subreddits like skin_care.
